spec.name: Sidi Maarouf Mausoleum
spec.description: The Sidi Maarouf Mausoleum (Marabout de Sidi Maarouf) is a local religious shrine located in the Sidi Maarouf neighborhood, which is named after the saint. The site is a traditional center for local veneration, pilgrimage, and spiritual gatherings, reflecting the importance of Sufi tradition in the area's identity.

people.comment: The revered local saint after whom the neighborhood is named.
